description: As parents, we all know that tummy time is the most important period for infants. This water mat is really bright and colorful, which keeps your baby attention, you will entertained watching your little one have fun squeezing, squishing and pressing the water mat, while trying to move the colorful fishes around. Also this tummy time mat is just right for your baby to promote overall development, sensory integration & cognitive development, visual stimulation & Emotional infection. Practice the muscles of neck, back and shoulder. Formation of hand arches for fine motor skills. this tummy time water mat has colorful marine animal toys that will appear to be moving due to the water effect. Your baby will be attracted by the colors and movement and will have a great time playing on the water mat.

1.Prevent Head Flat 2.Hand-eye Coordination 3.Perceived Ability 4.Motor Skills 5.Intestinal Motility Promotes Defecation 6.Color Perception 7.Visual Development 8.Promote Brain Development 9.Parent-child Interaction Enhances Feelings
1.Mat should lie flat to prevent babies from tumbling and injuring themselves 2.Keep away from sharp objects 3.Keep away from sunlight when not in use 4.Replace the water every 1-2 week.
